raw: Congress Just Spent $2 Trillion on Coronavirus Relief. It’s Eying More. .
replaced: Congress Just Spent $2 Trillion on Coronavirus Relief. It’s Eying More. .

raw: Virginia and Maryland , as well as the District of Columbia , issued new orders on Monday for residents to stay home .
replaced: Virginia and Maryland , as well as the District of Columbia , issued new orders on Monday for residents to stay home .

raw: And in Florida , Gov. Ron DeSantis , a Republican who had resisted a statewide edict , said that he would sign an directive codifying a patchwork of local rules urging residents in the densely - populated southeast corner of the state — including Miami - Dade , Broward , Palm Beach and Monroe Counties — to stay at home .
replaced: And in Florida , Mr. Trump said that Mr. Trump would sign an directive codifying a patchwork of local rules urging residents in the densely - populated southeast corner of Florida — including Miami - Dade , Broward , Palm Beach and Monroe Counties — to stay at home .

raw: Even as Mr. Trump suggested that his administration is allowing governors to do “ pretty much what they want , with our supervision , ” Dr. Deborah L. Birx , the White House coronavirus response coordinator , said every governor and mayor should implement new , longer - term distancing guidelines put in place on Sunday .

raw: “ When you look at all of the states together , all of them are moving at exactly the same curve , ” Dr. Birx said .
replaced: “ When you look at all of them together , all of them are moving at exactly the same curve , ” Dr. Birx said .

raw: “ And that ’s why we really believe this needs to be federal guidance , so that every state understands that it may look like two cases today that becomes 20 , that become 200 , that become 2,000 — and that ’s what we ’re trying to prevent . ”

raw: Mr. Trump continued to clash behind the scenes with governors over the availability of testing , suggesting on a private call that a chronic lack of kits to test people for Covid-19 is no longer a problem even as some of them insisted that they still lacked the supplies they needed .

raw: Across the country , companies — including several major retailers — announced huge layoffs .
replaced: Across the United States , companies — including several major retailers — announced huge layoffs .

raw: Macy ’s , which had 125,000 employees at the end of last year , said on Monday that it would furlough most of them after having lost “ the majority ” of its sales because of store closures .

raw: L Brands , which owns Victoria ’s Secret and Bath Body Works , also said it would furlough most store staff , and Gap said on Monday it would furlough nearly 80,000 store employees in the United States and Canada .

raw: In Washington , Ms. Pelosi and other officials involved in previous negotiations have acknowledged that it is unlikely that any legislation to address the crisis would be ready for a floor vote before mid - April , with both the House and Senate in recess and not scheduled to return to Capitol Hill until April 20 .
replaced: In Washington , Ms. Pelosi and other officials involved in the talks have acknowledged that it is unlikely that any legislation to address the crisis would be ready for a floor vote before mid - April , with both the House and Senate in recess and not scheduled to return to Capitol Hill until April 20 .
